text: penny Hey , guys , guys , some of the other waitresses wanted me to ask you something .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , it 's called trestling .
howard_wolowitz It combines the physical strength of arm wrestling with the mental agility of tetris into the ultimate sport .
penny Yeah , that 's terrific , but what they wanted me to ask you was to cut it the hell out . Right come on guys , come on . Happy birthday to you , happy birthday to you ... .
sheldon_cooper We might as well stop , it 's a stalemate . You 're beating me in tetris , but you 've got the upper body strength of a Keebler Elf .
raj_koothrappali Keebler Elf ? I 've got your Keebler Elf right here . Okay , it 's a stalemate .
penny So Leonard , will we be seeing you on Saturday for your free birthday cheesecake ?
sheldon_cooper He ca n't eat cheesecake , he 's lactose intolerant .
penny Okay , he can have carrot cake .
sheldon_cooper What about the cream cheese frosting .
penny he can scrape it off .
leonard_hofstadter Forget about the cake , how did you know that my birthday is Saturday ?
penny I did your horoscope , remember , I was going to do everybody 's until Sheldon went on one of his typical psychotic rants .

sheldon_cooper For the record , that psychotic rant was a concise summation of the research of Bertram Forer , who in 1948 proved conclusively through meticulously designed experiments , that astrology is nothing but pseudo scientific hokum .
penny Blah blah blah , a typical Taurus . So , seriously , are we going to see you Saturday ?
leonard_hofstadter Oh , I do n't think so .
penny Why not ?
leonard_hofstadter I do n't celebrate my birthday .
penny Shuddup , yeah you do .
leonard_hofstadter No , it 's no big deal , it 's just the way I was raised . My parents focussed on celebrating achievements , and being expelled from a birth canal was not considered one of them .
penny Uh , that 's so silly .
sheldon_cooper It 's actually based on very sound theories , his mother published a paper on it .
penny What was it called , ' I hate my son and that 's why he ca n't have cake ? '
sheldon_cooper It was obviously effective , Leonard grew up to be an experimental physicist . Perhaps if she 'd also denied him Christmas he 'd be a little better at it .
leonard_hofstadter Thank you .
howard_wolowitz Well I love birthdays , waking up to Mom 's special French Toast breakfast , wearing the birthday king crown , playing laser tag with all my friends .
penny Yeah , see , that 's what kids should have .
howard_wolowitz Actually that was last year .
penny So you 've really never had a birthday party ?

leonard_hofstadter No . But it was okay . I mean , when I was little I 'd think maybe my parents would change their mind , and surprise me with a party , like this one birthday I came home from my Cello lesson , and I saw a lot of strange cars parked out front , and when I got to the door I could hear people whispering , and I could smell German chocolate cake , which is my favorite .
penny And ?
leonard_hofstadter Uh , it turns out my grandfather had died .
penny Oh my God , that 's terrible .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , it was kind of like a birthday party . I got to see all my cousins and there was cake , so ... 7 .
penny That 's the saddest thing I 've ever heard .
howard_wolowitz You think ? Go ahead , tell her about your senior prom .
howard_wolowitz Make sure they remember no peanuts .
leonard_hofstadter Howard , every Thai restaurant in town knows you ca n't eat peanuts . They see me coming they go ' ah , no peanut boy ! '
sheldon_cooper Hello Penny . Leonard just left .
penny I know . I want to talk to you .
sheldon_cooper What would we talk about ? We 've no overlapping areas of interest I 'm aware of , and you know I do n't care for chit - chat .
penny Okay , can you just let me in .
sheldon_cooper Well alright , but I do n't see this as a promising endeavour .
penny Okay , here 's the deal , we are going to throw Leonard a kick - ass surprise party for his birthday on Saturday .
sheldon_cooper I hardly think so , Leonard made it very clear he does n't want a party .
howard_wolowitz Did someone say party ?
penny He just does n't know he wants one because he 's never had one .
howard_wolowitz I suppose that 's possible , but for the record , I 've never had a threesome and yet I still know I want one .
penny Howard , here 's the difference . The possibility exists that Leonard could have a birthday party before hell freezes over .
howard_wolowitz Fine . If I do have a threesome , you ca n't be part of it . I 'm just kidding , yes you can . Can you bring a friend ?
sheldon_cooper I think a birthday party is a terrible idea . I envy Leonard for growing up without that anguish .
penny Anguish ?

sheldon_cooper Year after year , I had to endure wearing conical hats while being forced into the crowded sweaty hell of bouncy castles , not to mention being blindfolded and spun towards a grotesque tailless donkey as the other children mocked my disorientation .
penny Okay , sweetie , I understand you have scars that no non - professional can heal , but nevertheless we are going to throw Leonard a birthday party .
sheldon_cooper Have I pointed out that I am extremely uncomfortable with dancing , loud music and most other forms of alcohol induced frivolity .
penny Nevertheless we are ... .
sheldon_cooper In addition I really do n't think that Leonard wants a ... .

penny Okay , here 's the deal , you either help me throw Leonard a birthday party or , so help me God , I will go into your bedroom and I will unbag all of your most valuable mint condition comic books . And on one of them , you wo n't know which , I 'll draw a tiny happy face in ink .
sheldon_cooper You ca n't do that , if you make a mark on a mint comic book it 's no longer mint .
penny Sheldon , do you understand the concept of blackmail ?
sheldon_cooper Well of course I ... oh ! Yeah , I have an idea , let 's throw Leonard a kick ass birthday party .
sheldon_cooper That 's not the secret knock . This is the secret knock .
howard_wolowitz What difference does it make ?
sheldon_cooper The whole point of a secret knock is to establish a non - verbal signal to verify the identity of one 's co - conspirators .
penny Is that Raj and Howard ?
sheldon_cooper Possibly , but unverified .
howard_wolowitz Can you just let us in .
sheldon_cooper Luckily for you this is not a nuclear reactor .
penny So , what did you get the birthday boy ?

howard_wolowitz Well , Raj got him an awesome limited edition Dark Knight sculpture based on Alex Ross 's definitive Batman , and I got him this amazing autographed copy of the Feynman lectures on physics .
penny Nice . I got him a sweater .
howard_wolowitz Okay , well , he might like that , I 've seen him ... chilly .
penny Uh , Sheldon , I did n't see your present .
sheldon_cooper That 's because I did n't bring one .
penny Well why not ?
howard_wolowitz Do n't ask .
sheldon_cooper The entire institution of gift giving makes no sense .
howard_wolowitz Too late .

sheldon_cooper Let 's say that I go out and I spend fifty dollars on you , it 's a laborious activity , because I have to imagine what you need , whereas you know what you need . Now I can simplify things , just give you the fifty dollars directly and , you could give me fifty dollars on my birthday , and so on until one of us dies leaving the other one old and fifty dollars richer . And I ask you , is it worth it ?
howard_wolowitz Told you not to ask .
penny Well , Sheldon , you 're his friend . Friends give each other presents .
sheldon_cooper I accept your premise , I reject your conclusion .
howard_wolowitz Try telling him it 's a non - optional social convention .
penny What ?
howard_wolowitz Just do it .
penny It 's a non - optional social convention .
sheldon_cooper Oh . Fair enough .
howard_wolowitz He came with a manual .

sheldon_cooper Question , how am I going to get Leonard a present before the party ? I do n't drive , and the only things available within walking distance are a Thai restaurant and a gas station . I suppose I could wrap up an order of mee krob and a couple of lottery scratchers .
penny Okay , let 's do this , um , I will drive Sheldon to get a present , and Howard , you need to get rid of Leonard for about two hours .
howard_wolowitz No problem .
penny And then Raj , you bring the stuff across the hall and start setting up .
howard_wolowitz What if guests show up ?
penny Entertain them .
howard_wolowitz What if they 're women ?
penny Stare at them and make them feel uncomfortable .
howard_wolowitz Hey !
leonard_hofstadter Hey .
howard_wolowitz How 's it going ?
leonard_hofstadter Fine .
howard_wolowitz So , listen , the New Art is showing the revised definitive cut of Blade Runner .
leonard_hofstadter Seen it .
howard_wolowitz No , you 've seen the 25th anniversary final cut . This one has eight seconds of previously unseen footage . They say it completely changes the tone of the film .
leonard_hofstadter Oh . Pass .
howard_wolowitz Come on , afterwards there 's a Q & A with Harrison Ford 's body double .
leonard_hofstadter Look , I am in the Halo battle of my life here , there 's this kid in Copenhagen , he has no immune system so all he does is sit in his bubble and play Halo 24/7 .
howard_wolowitz Ca n't you play him some other time ?
leonard_hofstadter Not if you believe his doctors .
howard_wolowitz Oh my God , do you smell gas .
leonard_hofstadter No .
howard_wolowitz Yeah , no .
penny Alright , you know they have DVDs over there .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but they have DVD burners over here . Leonard needs a DVD burner .
penny Sheldon , a gift should n't be something someone needs , it should be something fun , you know , something they would n't buy for themselves .
sheldon_cooper You mean , like a sweater ?
penny Well , it 's a fun sweater , it 's got a bold geometric print .
sheldon_cooper Is it the geometry that makes it fun .
penny Okay , the point is , one of the ways we show we care about people is by putting thought and imagination into the gifts we give them .
sheldon_cooper Okay , I see , so not a DVD burner .
penny Exactly .
sheldon_cooper Something he would n't buy for himself . Something fun . Something like ... oh , an 802.11n wireless router .
leonard_hofstadter Here you go , Copenhagen boy , how about a taste of Hans Christian Hand Grenade . Come on , come on , oh you clever little ... Come on , come on , take that !
howard_wolowitz Oh - oh . Oh - oh !
leonard_hofstadter What 's the matter ?
howard_wolowitz This granola bar , there 's peanuts in it .
leonard_hofstadter Oh my God , why did you eat it ?
howard_wolowitz I do n't know , it was just there .
leonard_hofstadter Well if I had a gun there , would you have shot yourself ?
howard_wolowitz Do n't yell at me , I 've got to go to the emergency room .
leonard_hofstadter Now ?
howard_wolowitz No , after my tongue has swollen to the size of a brisket .
leonard_hofstadter Alright , um , just , uh , let me get my keys .

howard_wolowitz Oh God , oh God , oh God , oh ... The laundry is out of the hamper . Okay Sheldon , what was it supposed to be ? Fine , it 's out of the washer . I 'll call you when it 's in the dryer .
leonard_hofstadter Alright , let 's go .
sheldon_cooper What do you think .
penny Um , that one .
sheldon_cooper Because of the two additional Ethernet ports .
penny Sure .
sheldon_cooper He does n't need them , he 's already got a 640 connect switch .
penny Oh , okay then this one .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
penny I do n't know , the man on the box looks so happy .
sheldon_cooper Penny ! If I 'm going to buy Leonard a gift , I 'm going to do it right . I refuse to let him experience the same childhood trauma I did .
penny Oh , I know I 'm going to regret this but , what trauma ?
sheldon_cooper On my twelfth birthday I really wanted a titanium centrifuge , so , you know , I could separate radioactive isotopes .
penny Of course .
sheldon_cooper Instead of a titanium centrifuge , my parents bought me ... wow , this is hard . They got me ... a motorised dirt bike .
penny No ?
sheldon_cooper What twelve year old boy wants a motorised dirt bike ?
penny All of them .
sheldon_cooper Really ?
penny Yeah .
sheldon_cooper Huh ?
penny Okay , so we 're getting this one ?
sheldon_cooper Yeah , I suppose .
penny Okay , let 's go .
random_woman Excuse me , do you know anything about this stuff ?
sheldon_cooper I know everything about this stuff .
woman Okay , I have my own wholesale flower business , and I want to hook up my computer in the front entrance with the one in my refrigerated warehouse .
penny Here , buy this one . Look , it 's the one we 're getting , see , happy guy available .
sheldon_cooper No , no , no , no , she does n't want that , she needs a point to point peer network with a range extender .
woman Thank you .
random_guy Which hard drive do I want , firewire or USB ?
sheldon_cooper It depends on what Bus you have .
guy I drive a Chevy Cavalier .
sheldon_cooper Oh , dear lord .
penny Sheldon , we have to go .
sheldon_cooper Not now , Penny , this poor man needs me . You hold on , I 'll be right with you . What computer do you have , and please do n't say a white one ?
howard_wolowitz Excuse me .
nurse Fill this out , have a seat .
howard_wolowitz No , listen , see we 're throwing my friend a surprise party and I 'm supposed to keep him out of his apartment for two hours .
nurse Uh - huh , fill this out and have a seat .
howard_wolowitz No , see , the only way I could get him to leave is to tell him I ate a peanut . Because I 'm allergic to peanuts .
nurse Oh , well in that case fill this out and have a seat .

howard_wolowitz Look , all I need from you is to take me in the back and give me a band - aid so I can pretend I had a shot of epinephrine and they you tell my friend you need to keep me under observation for about an hour , hour and a half .
nurse Is that all you need ?
howard_wolowitz Yes .
nurse Get out of my ER .
howard_wolowitz No , you do n't understand .
nurse Oh , I understand , but unfortunately this hospital is not equipped to treat stupid .
howard_wolowitz Okay , I get it , I know how the world works , how about if I were to introduce you to the man who freed your people .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , sorry I could n't find a parking spot , how are you doing .
howard_wolowitz Bad , very bad .
leonard_hofstadter Really , 'cos you do n't look like you 're swelling up at all , maybe we should just pick up some benedryl at the drug store and go home .
howard_wolowitz We ca n't go home .
leonard_hofstadter Why not ?
howard_wolowitz Becauth Becauth - th - th . Brissket , Brissket ! Water , need water .
leonard_hofstadter Alright , I 'll be right back .
howard_wolowitz Penny , look , I 've got a problem .
penny Yeah , well so do I , look you 've got to stall Leonard a little longer .
howard_wolowitz I do n't think I can .
penny You have to , we all have to be there at the same time to yell ' surprise ! '
howard_wolowitz Okay , you have to understand something , we 're in a hospital right now .
penny Why , is Leonard okay .
howard_wolowitz Leonard 's fine . I 'm fine , thanks for asking , by the way .
penny Okay , I do n't need your attitude , just hold him there a little longer .
howard_wolowitz Look , I 've done my best but he wants to go home and I do n't know how to stop him .
penny Okay , how about this . You keep him there a little longer and when you get to the party I 'll point out which of my friends are easy .
howard_wolowitz Do n't toy with me , woman .

penny I 've got a hot former fat girl with no self - esteem , I 've got a girl who punishes her father by sleeping around and an alcoholic who 's two tequila shots away from letting you wear her like a hat .
howard_wolowitz Thy will be done . I 'm doing this for you , little buddy .
sheldon_cooper Okay , we do n't have that in stock , but I can special order it for you .
penny Him .
althea Excuse me , sir , you do n't work here .
sheldon_cooper Yes , well , apparently neither does anyone else .
penny Sheldon , we have to go .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
penny Well , for one thing , we 're late for Leonard 's birthday party . And for another , I told him to call security .
sheldon_cooper Good luck . By the way , a six year - old could hack your computer system .
penny Keep walking .
sheldon_cooper Yeah , 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 is not a secure password .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me , my friend is having an allergic reaction to peanuts .
nurse No he 's not .
leonard_hofstadter Yes he is .
nurse Look , sir we are very busy here and I just do n't ... holy crap !
howard_wolowitz Pees hep me !
nurse Code 4 , I need a gurney , right away , right away .
howard_wolowitz Fank - u .
leonard_hofstadter Say what you will about the healthcare system in this country , but when they 're afraid of lawsuits they sure test everything .
howard_wolowitz I really do n't think the colonoscopy was necessary .
leonard_hofstadter You know , before you got all swollen up , I actually thought you were trying to keep me out of the apartment so you could throw me a surprise party .
howard_wolowitz Oh , right , it 's your birthday , I had no idea it was your birthday , I completely forgot , wow , what a lousy way to spend a birthday , well it 's all over now .
leonard_hofstadter There is a party , is n't there .
howard_wolowitz Maybe .
leonard_hofstadter Howard .
howard_wolowitz Are you mad ?
leonard_hofstadter how could I be mad ? You actually risked your life because you cared about me .
howard_wolowitz Yeah , that 's why I did it .
leonard_hofstadter Alright . Here we go . My first birthday party .
raj_koothrappali Dude ! Everybody left an hour ago ! Surprise !

raj_koothrappali Okay Leonard , here I am at your birthday party , I do n't know where you are dude , but it 's really kick - ass . Everyone is very very drunk , and uh ... Oh look , there 's a girl taking her shirt off .
penny That 's my friend Carol . Remind me , I 've got to introduce her to Howard .
raj_koothrappali Oh sweet Krishna , shake it , that - a rupee maker .
penny I 'm so sorry you did n't get your party .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , it 's okay .
penny Happy birthday anyways .
leonard_hofstadter Hey Penny , when , uh , when 's your birthday ?
